topic: Live updates: Australia face India in third T20, scores and commentary

ideas.title: Yarra River Wickets
ideas.premise: A cricket pitch spans the Yarra River; a mistimed shot lands a batsman in the murky water, with nearby punters unfazed.
ideas.why_funny: Playing on Melbourneâ€™s dirty river; the typical Melburnian indifference to chaos.

ideas.title: The G's Ghost
ideas.premise: The ghost of Don Bradman appears during a tense moment, offering hilariously outdated batting advice in broad Australian slang.
ideas.why_funny: Iconic figure offering completely useless tips for modern T20.

ideas.title: Commentary Curse
ideas.premise: A commentator loudly praises an Australian batsman just before they get out, and is then mobbed by angry fans.
ideas.why_funny: A relatable experience of the 'commentator's curse' exaggerated.

ideas.title: Scomo's Substitute
ideas.premise: Scott Morrison (Scomo) unexpectedly subs in for an injured player, wearing an ill-fitting kit and looking utterly clueless.
ideas.why_funny: Morrison's history of photo-ops and awkward appearances satirised.

ideas.title: Four Six and Out!
ideas.premise: After hitting a six, an Australian player is immediately distracted by a flock of swooping magpies and gets caught out.
ideas.why_funny: Classic Aussie wildlife hazard ruining a pivotal moment.

headlines.title: Live updates: Australia face India in third T20, scores and commentary
headlines.summary: Following a dominant win in Melbourne, Australia can take a massive step towards winning the T20 series against India with a victory in Hobart. Check
